notables.name: Toxic Delivery
mods: Poison you inflict with Critical Strikes deals 20% more Damage
Recover 0.5% of Life per Poison affecting Enemies you Kill
5% increased Poison Duration for each Poison you have inflicted Recently, upto a maximum of 100%
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)

notables.name: Mystical Infusion
mods: Base Spell Critical Strike Chance of Spells is equal to that of Main Hand Weapon

notables.name: Mistwalker
mods: Gain Elusive on Critical Strike
100% increased Elusive Effect
You take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while Elusive

(Elusive initially grants 15% chance to Avoid All Damage from Hits, and 30% increased Movement Speed. The buff reduces its effect over time, removing itself at 0% effect. If you already have an Elusive buff, you cannot gain Elusive)

notables.name: Shadowed Blood
mods: 40% of Physical Damage taken Recouped as Life
Unaffected by Damaging Ailments
(Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)
(Debuffs you are Unaffected by can still be placed on you, but will not actually apply their effect)
(Only Damage from Hits can be Recouped, over 4 seconds following the Hit)

notables.name: Assassination Style
mods: (Choose one of the two attached options)

notables.name: Infused Toxins
mods: All Damage from Hits can Poison

notables.name: Unstable Infusion
mods: 15% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
30% chance to gain a Power Charge on Non-Critical Strike
+1 to Maximum Power Charges

notables.name: Deathmarked
mods: Trigger Level 30 Assassin's Mark on Attack Critical Strike againsta Rare or Unique Enemy and you have no Mark
Mark Skills Cost no Mana
Marked Enemy cannot Evade Attacks
(Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time)

notables.name: Opportunistic
mods: Damage from your Critical Strikes cannot be Reflected
25% more Damage while there is at most one Rare or Unique Enemy nearby
35% less Damage taken while there are at least two Rare or Unique Enemies nearby

notables.name: Perfect Crime
mods: Triggers Level 20 Summon Triggerbots when Allocated
35% less Damage with Triggered Spells
(Summon two Triggerbots which follow you around and run towards enemies. Your Triggered Spells Trigger twice, once from each Triggerbot's location)

notables.name: Demolitions Specialist
mods: 150% increased Effect of Auras from Mines
Mines Hinder Enemies near them for 2 seconds when they Land
(Hinder reduces movement speed by 30%)

notables.name: Chain Reaction
mods: When your Traps Trigger, your nearby Traps also Trigger
Skills used by Traps have 50% increased Area of Effect

notables.name: Bomb Specialist
mods: Hits have 30% chance to deal 50% more Area Damage
30% chance to take 50% less Area Damage from Hits

notables.name: Shrapnel Specialist
mods: Projectiles have 50% chance to Return to you
Projectiles are fired in random directions

notables.name: Pyromaniac
mods: Regenerate 2% of Life per second for each Mine Detonated Recently, up to 10% per second
Regenerate 2% of Life per Second for each Trap Triggered Recently, up to 10% per second
Immune to Ignite and Shock
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)

notables.name: Born in the Shadows
mods: Cannot be Blinded
15% reduced Damage taken from Blinded Enemies
Nearby Enemies are Blinded
Blind Enemies on Hit
(Being Blinded causes 20% less Accuracy Rating and Evasion Rating, for 4 seconds)
(Being Blinded causes 20% less Accuracy Rating and Evasion Rating)
generic_buff_aura

notables.name: Calculated Risk
mods: Your Critical Strike Chance is Lucky
Damage with Hits is Unlucky
(Lucky things are rolled twice and the best result used)

notables.name: Like Clockwork
mods: 40% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Nearby Enemies have 10% reduced Cooldown Recovery Rate

notables.name: Soul Drinker
mods: 2% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield
Energy Shield Leech effects are not removed when Energy Shield is Filled
(Leeched Energy Shield is recovered over time. Multiple Leeches can occur simultaneously, up to a maximum rate)

notables.name: Spellbreaker
mods: Prevent +15% of Suppressed Spell Damage while on Full Energy Shield
50% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you Suppress Spell Damage
(40% of Damage from Suppressed Hits and Ailments they inflict is prevented)

notables.name: One Step Ahead
mods: Your Action Speed is at least 90% of base value
Nearby Enemy Monsters' Action Speed is at most 90% of base value

notables.name: Swift Killer
mods: 200% increased Charge Duration
+2 to Maximum Frenzy Charges

notables.name: Polymath
mods: 2% more Damage for each different type of Mastery you have Allocated
Recover 1% of Life on Kill for each different type of Mastery you have Allocated
Recover 1% of Energy Shield on Kill for each different type of Mastery you have Allocated
Recover 1% of Mana on Kill for each different type of Mastery you have Allocated

notables.name: Heartstopper
mods: Every 10 seconds:Take 50% less Damage from Hits for 5 secondsTake 50% less Damage over Time for 5 seconds
(These are consecutive)
trickster damage over time taken +% final [-50]
trickster hit damage taken +% final [-50]

notables.name: Escape Artist
mods: +4 to Evasion Rating per 1 Maximum Energy Shield on Equipped Helmet
+1 to maximum Energy Shield per 8 Evasion Rating on Equipped Body Armour
